channel.title: I'd do anything for this to be fixed. O.o
channel.description:
Okai,so one day i looked at my cmd,and LOADS of ips are connecting,like so :
[IMG]http://i872.photobucket.com/albums/ab287/pasta186/zzzzips.png[/img]
I then tried to ban them,but they kept coming back.Edventually i saw this message every so often: [IMG]http://i872.photobucket.com/albums/ab287/pasta186/zzzip2.png[/img] I thought:Hm,if i could make my server stop saying that an ip has logged in,it will practically fix it. So,i go into my Server.java and remove stuff like: [code] misc.println("Connection from " + connectingHost + ":" + s.getPort());
[/code]
and
[code] System.out.println("They are in ip ban list!"); [/code]
It starts to work,but then i get the whole : [IMG]http://i872.photobucket.com/albums/ab287/pasta186/zzzip2.png[/img] thing again.
So i think,how can i stop it from saying that text.But then i realise i cant stop it.
So its either ddos,or this.HOW.CAN.I.FIX. Thank you.
USING DELTA 317.

item.title: I'd do anything for this to be fixed. O.o
item.dc:creator: @pasta186 pasta186
item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

Yes,i then proceeded to ask ,in detail,how to fix,and everyone just ignored.

Read full topic
item.source: I'd do anything for this to be fixed. O.o

item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

pasta186:

Yes,if i dont get it fixed,my server will just have to go offline.So im actually quite annoyed/urgent about this?Everytime,no one actually answers.

We’ve answered, you didn’t understand our answers.

Read full topic

item.title: I'd do anything for this to be fixed. O.o
item.dc:creator: @pasta186 pasta186
item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

Okai,so one day i looked at my cmd,and LOADS of ips are connecting,like so :

zzzzips.png823×482

I then tried to ban them,but they kept coming back.Edventually i saw this message every so often:

zzzip2.png827×482

I thought:Hm,if i could make my server stop saying that an ip has logged in,it will practically fix it.
So,i go into my Server.java and remove stuff like:

misc.println("Connection from "
										+ connectingHost + ":" + s.getPort());

and

	System.out.println("They are in ip ban list!");

It starts to work,but then i get the whole :

zzzip2.png827×482

thing again.

So i think,how can i stop it from saying that text.But then i realise i cant stop it.

So its either ddos,or this.HOW.CAN.I.FIX.
Thank you.

USING DELTA 317.

Read full topic
